name: A Study in Captivity
description:
Eliza is a young private detective who is currently working on the mysterious circumstances of an aristocrat's death. However, as soon as she feels she's making some progress on the case, she finds herself locked up in an unfamiliar room with only a taunting letter to greet her.

With only 3 attempts to escape the room. she must solve the cryptic puzzles behind the messages left for in order to make her escape. Which ending will you end up with?

!!This game is still in a prototype phase, and this current version is only set as a proof of concept.!!
